faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.noResults: No results found matching your search criteria.

questions.q1: How do I get started with AsistanApp?
questions.a1: To get started with AsistanApp, first complete your account settings. Then customize your AI assistant and connect your social media channels. You can find detailed information in our getting started guide.
questions.q2: How do I create my first AI assistant?
questions.a2: You can create a new AI assistant from Settings > Assistant section. Enter your business information, select the tone, and upload your training data. The system will start learning automatically.
questions.a3: You can integrate by scanning the QR code or using an API key from Settings > Channel Integrations > WhatsApp section. Follow our detailed setup guide.
questions.q4: How can I transfer AI conversations to a human?
questions.a4: You can manually transfer by going to the conversation details on the Conversations screen and clicking the "Transfer to Human" button. Additionally, AI can automatically request help in certain situations (unclear questions, complex requests).
questions.q5: How does the appointment system work?
questions.a5: Your AI assistant suggests suitable appointment times while talking to your customers. You can set your working hours, appointment durations, and special days from Settings > Appointment Settings.
questions.q6: How do I change my notification settings?
questions.a6: You can configure your email, SMS, and push notification preferences from Settings > Notifications. You can create separate notification rules for each channel.
questions.q7: How do I add a new team member?
questions.a7: Click the "Add New Team Member" button on the Team page. Specify the email, role, and permissions. The added member will receive an email invitation.
questions.q8: How do I grant permissions to team members?
questions.a8: Select the relevant member from the Team page and click the "Edit" button. You can select permissions such as conversation management, report viewing, and settings change from the permissions section.
questions.a9: Select the desired report on the Reports page. Set the date range and use the "Export to Excel" or "Export to PDF" buttons in the top right corner.
questions.q10: How do I interpret assistant performance metrics?
questions.a10: The assistant performance report includes metrics such as response time, success rate, and customer satisfaction. Green values indicate good performance, yellow values indicate areas for improvement.
questions.q11: AI is not responding, what should I do?
questions.a11: First, check your internet connection. Check the AI status from Settings > Assistant section. If the problem persists, open a ticket with our support team.
questions.a12: Check your channel integrations. You can check the connection status for WhatsApp and other platforms from Settings > Channel Integrations.
